name: Pollution Solution
author: Zerahan
title: Pollution Solution
description:
This mod connects pollution to other systems in Factorio, similar to polluted oxygen & slime in Oxygen Not Included.
	
	The native life of the planet is capable of absorbing pollution and transforming it into biological organisms (such as biters and spitters). By harvesting the organs that make that possible, you can collect pollution, then change it into a toxic sludge.
